title: event.status
description: Indicates if the [event](../event.json) is still happening or not.

type.description:
One of three possible status types.

- `available`: The event is happening as planned
- `temporarilyUnavailable`: The event will be postponed
- `unavailable`: The event is permanently cancelled

reason.description: The reason of the status on the event, as a localized human-readable text.
